metadata.title: CVE-2009-3042 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in machine.php in Open Computer and Software(OCS) Inventory NG 1.02.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via the systemid parameter, a different vector than CVE-2009-3040.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-3042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.0.5-1.1
ocsinventory-server - 2.0.5-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1.1').
